Name: moa_code
Title: Mixture-of-Agents Applied for Code Generation
Experiment: Implement Mixture-of-Agents for code generation, where each LLM API is called to generate Python code given a problem of programming competition. Modify the user_prompt and augment the instruction to make sure each LLM generates a final submission code only, without any text responses irrelevant to evaluation. Compare the execution speed and final performance with the baseline model.
